verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Holy God, Righteous One
You are beautiful, beautiful
Radiant fire of love
You are beautiful, beautiful

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy, Holy, Holy Lord
I want to be wholly and completely Yours

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
Oh, thank you for the cross
When all my sins were washed away
You set this soul apart
To live a life of endless praise

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
All consuming fire, testing and refining
In body, soul and mind God I am Yours
My heart is undivided
All of my delight in singing to my Saviour
I am Yours

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Holy God, Holy God
Your are beautiful, beautiful

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus
We give You the highest praise

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Blessing and honour, glory and power
It all belongs to You, all belongs to You
